description.oldValue:
You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit transcript files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in the transcript pane next to the video.
GA date: June CY2022
description.newValue:
You can upload, download, and delete captions in the Web VTT
file format for a video in SharePoint or OneDrive. This will enable you to edit
transcript files generated by Teams live transcript or Stream via downloading
the file, editing in a text or VTT editor, and re-uploading it. The VTT file
will be displayed as captions inside the video player and as a transcript in
the transcript pane next to the video.
